title: Why there are no Hobbit Rings of Power | Tolkien Explained
description:
Today, we cover Sauron's ORIGINAL plan for his Rings of Power, why Hobbits were never part of the plan - or offered rings, and what would happen to them if they did.

Hit subscribe and the bell for great Tolkien content every week!
